remarks: Lemma for ~ mbfeqa .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
statement:
mbfeqa.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
mbfeqa.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` A ) = 0 ) $.
mbfeqa.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( B \ A ) ) -> C = D ) $.
mbfeqalem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> C e. RR ) $.
mbfeqalem.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> D e. RR ) $.
mbfeqalem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. B |-> C ) e. MblFn <-> ( x e. B |-> D ) e. MblFn ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
